mapper.insert: insert into tb_reader (id, name, sex, barcode, vocation, birthday, paperType, paperNO, tel, email, createDate, operator, typeid, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{papertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paperno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_reader set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vocation = #{vocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, paperType = #{papertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paperNO = #{paperno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, sex, barcode, vocation, birthday, paperType, paperNO, tel, email, createDate, operator, typeid, remark from tb_reader where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, sex, barcode, vocation, birthday, paperType, paperNO, tel, email, createDate, operator, typeid, remark from tb_reader
